name: Daily Quotes by Jar of Quotes
author: Jar of Quotes

sections.description: This is a plugin to present your website visitors with daily quotes with the choice between text, image or both. This plugin, using a PHP API, is located at https://www.jarofquotes.com/webapi.php. The API outputs a JSON file containing the quote id, author, text, URL and image location. This JSON refreshes with a new quote once a day.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings -> Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. Go to Appearence -> Widgets and search for ‘Daily Quotes by Jar of Quotes’ widget and place it where you want.
sections.faq:
What language are the quotes in?

English

Is there a bandwidth limit?

No, you can have as many users coming to your website and the plugin will still work.

short_description: This plugin enables your website to display daily quotes on sidebars.
